New York City is bracing for possible snow next week amid strong winds and cold temperatures, while the FDNY warns of increased fire risks during the colder months; additionally, the NYC Council has passed a bill to restore sex abuse lawsuits, and a construction worker was rescued after a fall in Manhattan.

### Risks & Alerts

- N.Y. weather: Strong winds, cold temperatures, possible snow showers to impact NYC today. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- FDNY issues warning about fire risk for colder months; residents should check smoke detectors. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMikAFBVV95cUxNYnZqa3BYZjZfOTJ3bzZIRUlHSDZhR0hCc3VIUXV5THk2MXgybXJIeWdSajlVMDU1Ul9xeV9RRlZlSHRaTm0wbVZLOUFXMVRQLURwV2VpLXctYkZkX01zaHc2UllMeC1WbUV4RkRfYi1ESzJLWnlkVk54blpYM0p4R3hLcDcwLXlpOGFnMXcyY08?oc=5)
- Police monitoring DC shooting of National Guard members; no threat to NYC reported. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMipAFBVV95cUxNcWJKeWJEazVvSno0b1UyMlVqckVweThDTWxfMHhpbDludWtQUmtpR19XTDFBWXk1TVNkSE9qZV9xSXB3NklrWF9qdzRucmhNVm9oa3Q1cVZManhoYXNrVUFfVFh5cV9YUGZMalhpeVdIdU9WenlzNlBqWThCWE1OZkJrM1FIYktkR1Z2SDY5SWxtTVg2TW1DMzJfU3EzTUZMRHcxWA?oc=5)
- Construction worker rescued after falling 30 feet down Manhattan manhole; area may experience delays. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMinAFBVV95cUxPXzNwcHVGaGRpM3BmWlRFMkV6Rl9RZ2FQZTlvYU9sYnczYVJ4anNlb1VKRGtTT3gxMlBCWkdUdHFIdVNpRnU2d3pHS1RoVFZ3SGVEUHZTT2x1bjl4dDY0RU84NjJUR1pSYW1QYWViUnlQNWRXeTZ1TEllNTZoWDNyS1QwdWZCNHZUSWlpYkZfWmM2MmFGeFZUQk9PYW8?oc=5)
- Forecasters predict possible winter storm next week; residents should prepare for potential impacts. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
